Title: Welcoming Everyone to MAUI
Description: NET MAUI is the next generation of cross-platform .NET development stack. A truly single code base powers apps to reach mobile/desktop natively, with a tighter inner loop & smarter app architecture. With .NET 6/7, MAUI promotes code reuse across platforms & enables modernization strategies.
